Verses: 1 pinbu Agiththoppel Apsalomai Nokki: Naan Panneeraayiramperaith Therindhukondu Ezhundhu, Indru Raaththiri Dhaaveedhaip Pinthodarndhu Pogattum.

2 avan Vidaaiththavanum Kai Thalarndhavanumaayirukkaiyil, Naan Avanidaththil Poi, Avanaith Thidukkidappannuven; Appozhudhu Avanodirukkum Janangalellaarum Odippovadhinaal, Naan Raajaa Oruvanaimaaththiram Vetti,
3 janangalaiyellaam Ummudaiya Vasamaaith Thirumbappannuven, Ippadichcheyya Neer Vagaithedinaal, Ellaarum Thirumbinapin Janangal Samaadhaanaththodu Iruppaargal Endraan.
4 indha Vaarththai Apsalomin Paarvaikkum Israveludaiya Sagala Moopparin Paarvaikkum Nalamaaith Thondrinadhu.
5 aagilum Apsalom: Arkiyanaagiya Oosaayaik Kooppittu, Avan Vaaimozhiyaiyum Ketpom Endraan.
6 oosaai Apsalomidaththil Vandhapodhu, Apsalom Avanaip Paarththu: Indhappragaaramaaga Agipdhoppel Sonnaan; Avan Vaarththaiyinpadiseyvomo? Allavendraal, Nee Sol Endraan
7 appozhudhu Oosaai Apsalomai Nokki: Agiththoppel Indha Visaisonna Aalosanai Nalladhalla Endraan.
